messages.title: It's Dr Charles West or the Conservative here
messages.content: Labour are not the challengers here this time. Voting for them will just help elect a Conservative MP again. Only a vote for Dr Charles West will bring real change for our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Dr Charles West will bring real change for our area.

issues.governance: Gordon Brown's record of shame: Got us into a mess with the banks. Has been privatising the NHS bit by bit. Dithered over taking action on MPs' expenses.
issues.health: Gordon Brown's record of shame: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise. Has been privatising the NHS bit by bit.

quotes.text: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise
